name: CLOUDLINE
description:
Cloudline is a local 2 player fighting game that takes insperation from a lot of different fighting games such as Super Smash Bros and Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi. It features over the top action with cute and hand-drawn art.

Created in five days for Castle Jam 2018(Örebro, Sweden)

TWO CONTROLLERS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED!

How to control your hero
D-pad: Movement
X/Y: Jump

Cloud
Controls the weather

Attacks:
A: Wind
B: Water
Up + B: Blizzard
Down + B: Lightning bolt

Umbrella man
A nimble sailor

Attacks:
A: Umbrella hit
B + grounded: Reflect/block
B + air: Down smash
L/R Shoulder buttons: Dash

Keyboard controls (not recommended)

WASD or Arrows: Move
Space or "-": Jump
F or P: Attack
G or O: Special
Q/E or K/L: Dash


Team:
Programmer: Simon Bothén @Caresilabs
Art: Sebastian Lind @Elastiskalinjen
Music and sound: Mikko Aaltio
